files.description: Single CLI entrypoint that creates outputs/, runs a deterministic toy experiment producing artifacts, writes outputs/index.md manifest, and exits with nonzero status on any failure.

errors.detail:
pts/run_pipeline.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/__init__.py", "scripts/generate_results.py", "scripts/generate_roadmap.py", "scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py", "scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Wrote a single CLI pipeline entrypoint that creates outputs/, runs a deterministic toy experiment, writes outputs/index.md, and exits nonzero on failure.

files.description: CI workflow that checks out the repo, runs scripts/run_pipeline.py on pushes/PRs, and fails the build if the pipeline exits nonzero or expected outputs are missing.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs scripts/run_pipeline.py on pushes/PRs and fails if outputs/index.md is missing or empty.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a GitHub Actions CI workflow to run scripts/run_pipeline.py on push/PR and fail if the pipeline or required outputs are missing.

missionDescription: Create/standardize scripts/run_pipeline.py as the sole entrypoint; ensure it creates ./outputs, runs the toy experiment, writes the manifest (./outputs/index.md), and exits nonzero on failure.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Reinforces the single deterministic entrypoint requirement (scripts/run_pipeline.py or python -m package.run) so a fresh clone can generate artifacts predictably and populate ./outputs without manual ...
